name: Seed: The Game
description:
Set in the near future, Bill Carey's "Seed: The Renaissance Project" concept centers around the adventures of an advanced female android, sent to find a new, habitable planet upon which to re-seed the devastated human race.  When Dr. Carey, the creator of Kristi1217, is murdered, the android briefly postpones her space exploration  in order to bring the killers to justice, with the help of three companions!

Go to http://www.facebook.com/seedtherenaissanceproject/  for more of the story!
